animation.condition: Control.HasFocus(82) | Control.HasFocus(90) | Control.HasFocus(88) | Control.HasFocus(89) | Control.HasFocus(83) | Control.HasFocus(84)
Control.HasFocus(82) | Control.HasFocus(90) | Control.HasFocus(88) | Control.HasFocus(89) | Control.HasFocus(83) | Control.HasFocus(84)

control.visible: [IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(script.metadata.actors.isactive)) + !Skin.HasSetting(HideInfoTags) + !Window.IsActive(movieinformation) + !Window.IsActive(musicinformation) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(artists)]] | [[Window.IsActive(movieinformation) | Window.IsActive(musicinformation)] + !Skin.HasSetting(info.hideinfotags)]
